name: Master Computer
description:
Master Computer is a 1 v 3 local multiplayer stealth game.

  • One player controls the eye searching for the other players. 
  • The remaining players must stay hidden and try to activate all the terminals; one in each corner of the level to win. 
  • However the level is entirely shrouded by darkness which only the eye's spotlight can relieve. 
  • Players on the ground have to navigate the maze using the vibration of their controller.
  • Each terminal is enabled for the players by collecting enough data-chips (dots) scattered around the maze. To succeed they must learn to run as well as hide.

Minimum of 2 players are needed to play. Controllers are also required to play this game (Xbox preferably).
